rows.label: bf05390100_0010
rows.name:
Who?!
Who's responsible for this?!

rows.label: bf05390100_0020
rows.name:
Preparations are still ongoing,
if we attack now we could-

rows.label: bf05390100_0030
rows.name: What have you done, Senator Roderich?

rows.label: bf05390100_0040
rows.name: Special Inquisitor?! What are you doing here?

rows.label: bf05390100_0050
rows.name:
The Emperor ordered that the dig be halted.
He was very specific, Senator.

rows.label: bf05390100_0060
rows.name:
If you've restarted it, you have violated
His Majesty's will.

rows.label: bf05390100_0070
rows.name:
The Emperor doesn't understand 
Superbia's urgent lack of resources.

rows.label: bf05390100_0080
rows.name: This is for the Empire.

rows.label: bf05390100_0090
rows.name: What you think is irrelavant.

rows.label: bf05390100_0100
rows.name: My question is, why have you attacked Invidia.

rows.label: bf05390100_0110
rows.name: It wasn't me! I did not give that order!

rows.label: bf05390100_0120
rows.name:
Even I would never dream of declaring
war without His Majesty's express consent!

rows.label: bf05390100_0130
rows.name: So who in the...

rows.label: bf05390100_0140
rows.name: Meleph!

rows.label: bf05390100_0150
rows.name:
Who...who are these people?!
Bursting in here?

rows.label: bf05390100_0160
rows.name:
This is the Driver of the Holy Grail.
You are to afford him the same respect as me.

rows.label: bf05390100_0170
rows.name: This is him?! I'd heard the rumors, but this boy...

rows.label: bf05390100_0180
rows.name:
There are rumors now?
Wow, am I really that famous?

rows.label: bf05390100_0190
rows.name:
Do you have any idea how much it costs to repair a water tower?
It's a lot.

rows.label: bf05390100_0200
rows.name: So, less famous, more infamous.

rows.label: bf05390100_0210
rows.name: Meleph, is Superbia really attacking?

rows.label: bf05390100_0220
rows.name: They are. As much as I hate to admit it.

rows.label: bf05390100_0230
rows.name: Tell me - what's going on?!

rows.label: bf05390100_0240
rows.name:
Tricky indeed.
If this escalates into all-out war...

rows.label: bf05390100_0250
rows.name:
The timing is all wrong.
We can't win this fight, not now...

rows.label: bf05390100_0260
rows.name:
Sounds like you WERE planning to start
this sooner or later. Sly rat.

rows.label: bf05390100_0270
rows.name: Maybe save the accusations for now.

rows.label: bf05390100_0280
rows.name: But the Empire never really wanted a war, did it?

rows.label: bf05390100_0290
rows.name: That Core Crystal! Don't tell me...you're the-

rows.label: bf05390100_0300
rows.name: Answer me!

rows.label: bf05390100_0310
rows.name: Y-you're right.

rows.label: bf05390100_0320
rows.name: Hikari?

rows.label: bf05390100_0330
rows.name: Who stands to gain from an Superbian-Invidian war?

rows.label: bf05390100_0340
rows.name: Who gains... You don't mean-

rows.label: bf05390100_0350
rows.name: Shin and Iira!

rows.label: bf05390100_0360
rows.name: It very possible.

rows.label: bf05390100_0370
rows.name: But how?

rows.label: bf05390100_0380
rows.name: Maybe just coincidence after all...?

rows.label: bf05390100_0390
rows.name: Masterpon...

rows.label: bf05390100_0400
rows.name: I wish I could believe that.

rows.label: bf05390100_0410
rows.name:
Inquisitor Meleph, please. You are the
only one who can put a stop to this!

rows.label: bf05390100_0420
rows.name: It's a bit late for that, don't you think?

rows.label: bf05390100_0430
rows.name:
But I'm not going to sit back and watch.
Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: bf05390100_0440
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: bf05390100_0450
rows.name: Meleph!

rows.label: bf05390100_0460
rows.name:
Rex, this is an imperial matter.
We can't ask for your aid in this affair.

rows.label: bf05390100_0470
rows.name: Not if it's really a coincidence, like Tora said.

rows.label: bf05390100_0480
rows.name:
But if Iira are really involved, doesn't
that make this our problem, too?

rows.label: bf05390100_0490
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf05390100_0500
rows.name: Think of it as compensation for the water tower!

rows.label: bf05390100_0505
rows.name: How's that?

rows.label: bf05390100_0510
rows.name: I knew you'd go there.

rows.label: bf05390100_0520
rows.name: You're so noble it hurts.

rows.label: bf05390100_0530
rows.name: Very well. Can I ask you to help me again?

rows.label: bf05390100_0540
rows.name: Yep! We're on the case!

rows.label: bf05390100_0550
rows.name: Yes, of course.

rows.label: bf05390100_0560
rows.name: I'll accompany you.

rows.label: bf05390100_0562
rows.name: Fan?

rows.label: bf05390100_0564
rows.name: What's happening in Temperantia right now...

rows.label: bf05390100_0566
rows.name: It's being led by a weaponized Divine Beast, correct?

rows.label: bf05390100_0568
rows.name:
My power doesn't only affect Blades.
It also works against Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf05390100_0570
rows.name: I am certain I can be of assistance.

rows.label: bf05390100_0572
rows.name: Besides...

rows.label: bf05390100_0574
rows.name: Besides?

rows.label: bf05390100_0580
rows.name:
I have the strangest feeling that I'm somehow
meant to be there.

rows.label: bf05390100_0590
rows.name: Fan la Norne, you...
